Oakwood Worldwide is proud to be a preferred vendor for Computer Sciences Corporation. Our vast inventory of fully-furnished apartments offer flexible lease terms and are conveniently located to Computer Sciences Corporation job site locations. Please click here to contact an Oakwood Representative to discuss your temporary housing needs.

If you have a large group housing request contact Jenn Citro, Account Manager of CSC, at 1-888-812-6625 or jcitro@oakwood.com.

Below are examples of the types of quality communities and typical amenities we offer. Please note that we will provide Oakwood and ExecuStay options for you to review once you submit a housing request form.

 

Washington D.C. Area

850 North Randolph Street Arlington, Virginia 22203

Located in the Ballston area of Northern Arlington, everything you could want or need is literally out your door step. Friendly service, full amenities, and city atmosphere are all included!

Back to Top

San Jose, CA

101 E. San Fernando Street San Jose, California 95112

Elevating Downtown Living, this contemporary estate-style urban residence offers residences infused with a modern interpretation of traditional Mediterranean architecture. Private walkways within create an exclusive, self-contained community right on the pulse of San Jose’s Historic District. Popular nightlife, dining venues and efficient transportation services are at your doorstep.

Back to Top

San Mateo, CA

1927 Bridgepointe Circle San Mateo, California 94404

Located right off of the bay, and minutes to San Mateo Bridge, this community is convenient to 92, 101, & 280 freeways and provides easy access to San Francisco International Airport, and the East Bay ara via San Mateo bridge. Walking distance to several great restaurant’s and shopping such as Target, Costco, Mimi’s Cafe, BJ’s brewhouse, Chipotle, Red Robin & More.

Less than 10 minutes to to Downtown San Mateo which features great boutiques, a movie theater and a diverse collection of restaurants.

Back to Top

Chicago, IL

210 North Wells Street Chicago, Illinois 60606

Anchoring the corner of Lake and Wells in the Chicago Loop, the brand new Oakwood 200 Squared ushers in a new era of modern urban Chicago housing. At this upscale high-rise, residents live in a building designed with sustainability in mind–all while surrounded by a playground of amenities and a neighborhood to match. Temporary apartments and long-term residences are available in a variety of spacious floor plans that include granite, stainless steel and floor-to-ceiling windows.

Back to Top

New York City, NY

400 West 37th Street New York, New York 10018

Fully furnished temporary apartment living in desirable Midtown West convenient to Madison Square Garden, Macy’s, Times Square, and Hudson River Parks. In your neighborhood, enjoy imported food stores, restaurants, cafes, shopping, and upscale dining. Public transportation conveniently located nearby with quick access to downtown and Jersey City.

Back to Top

Dallas, TX

2323 North Field Street Dallas, Texas 75201

Located across from the historic West End and with easy access to the American Airlines Center, you’ll be near any activity you want. Oakwood Worldwide offers a variety of floor plans and amenities that meet a wide range of tastes and needs.

Back to Top

Jersey City, NJ

31 River Court Jersey City, New Jersey 07310

Located in the Newport section of Jersey City and one of five high rise buildings that make up the Towers of America in Newport. Amenities include a 24-hour doorman and fully furnished housing.
Large one-bedroom and two-bedroom floorplans.

Back to Top

London

2 Praed Street London, England W2 1

A selection of contemporary studios, one and two bedroom apartments in one of the most exciting residential developments in central London, set around the Grand Union canal. The experience of waterside living is coupled with excellent West End locations with immediate access to Paddington station from where the Heathrow express operates every 15 minutes. There are direct links to the Financial areas of the City too. The 24 hour concierge offers a wealth of local knowledge and a sense of increased security.

Back to Top

Hong Kong

9K Kennedy Road Mid Levels, Hong Kong

Welcome to your stylish home in the center of Hong Kong island, Oakwood Apartments Mid Levels East Hong Kong. The property is a serviced apartment comparable to a trendy boutique hotel in Hong Kong. It is located in the exclusive district of Mid Levels and is within easy access of the Admiralty MTR station through a short scenic walk to the upscale business and commercial complex of Pacific Place.

Oakwood Hong Kong provides 24 fully furnished and fully equipped apartments, exclusively one-per-floor, with fabulous views of the Central, Admiralty and Wanchai districts. Designed for long-term stays, it is ideal for travelling executives who enjoy the basic comforts of modern serviced living in an exclusive, residential environment.
